title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.14 - When no date fixed for race
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.14 - When no date fixed for race

State Regulations

When no date is fixed for a race, the race shall be run
on the last day of the meeting unless otherwise agreed by all the parties
engaged and sanctioned by the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4054.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
